alert.note: Alert for Mineral; Missoula (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 5:28PM MDT until August 29 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Mineral County in west central Montana... Southwestern Missoula County in west central Montana... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 527 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southwest of Wye, or 14 miles west of Missoula, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alberton, Cyr, and Ninemile. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
